data.actual_result: The "Invite" and "Copy" button are cut off and continued by a "...", making it hard to understand what the buttons mean
data.expected_result: The buttons adjust to the actual String-length, so that it is fully readable
data.short_description: Buttons do not adjust to String-lengths of non-English languages
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your language to German - Rightclick a server and click on the blurple "Invite People" button ("Leute einladen" is the currently used String) - Observe
